My Desktop Workflow

page-type

Workflow

It varies wildly as I bounce between Windows, Linux, and macOS routinely. My CLI Workflow is the closest I get to consistent.

Core

some pleasing terminal emulator — lately, WezTerm

Syncthing

Dropbox — though I’m in the process of phasing it out in favor of Syncthing

Vivaldi

Firefox

Stable

VS Code — mostly for interoperability with folks who aren’t terminal console users
